about_the_game:
Joe Danger, the world’s most determined stuntman, has started filming the scariest horror movie ever made! This eldritch add-on for Joe Danger 2: The Movie features:

  • 15 horrifying new levels!
  • Six terrifying new characters!
  • Three blood-curdling new environments!
Hunt brains as Zombie, sabotage dark rituals as the Vampire Hunter, and escape the creeping darkness as Pumpkin Head! Claim skulls as the Rider, run the gauntlet as the Chimpanzombie and tame the dreaded Werebear! Each character is also playable in the original game, adding a little Halloween flavour to every thrill and spill!

Please note that this add-on requires a copy of Joe Danger 2: The Movie :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual core processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
